type: How to Contribute to the Docs

definition.text: Helping with keeping the Docs up to date, improving the delivery of the information, expanding on explanations, or simply fixing typos and grammar mistakes makes for a better user experience and lowers entry barriers for new users.

paragraphs.text: Left click and Edit to enter edit mode and change this text. ENTER to write new paragraphs. ESC to exit edit mode. Then you can use doscs.save to save your changes and app.contribute to send it to the main repository.
